channel.title: 彭博-市场
channel.description: 这是一个追踪彭博-市场news的种子

item.title: 企业领导人计划在明年留住员工并提高价格，以利用消费者信心的改善
item.description: Business leaders are planning to hold onto staff over the next year and hike prices to take advantage of improving consumer confidence trib.al/V6QTqMp

item.title: 前摩根士丹利亚洲区主席、耶鲁大学高级讲师斯蒂芬-罗奇（Stephen Roach）表示，中国要想让香港这个金融中心拥有更美好的未来，就必须解决经济问题，让香港自己管理自己。
item.description: China must fix its economy and let Hong Kong run itself if it wants a better future for the financial hub, former Morgan Stanley Asia chair and a senior lecturer at Yale University Stephen Roach says trib.al/89QfI7i

item.title: 摩根士丹利前亚洲区主席史蒂芬-罗奇（Stephen Roach）表示，中国若想让香港金融中心拥有更美好的未来，就必须解决经济问题，让香港自己管理自己。
item.description: China must fix its economy and let Hong Kong run itself if it wants a better future for the financial hub, former Morgan Stanley Asia chair Stephen Roach said trib.al/pitsUS0

item.title: 价值 280 亿美元的 USDC 稳定币运营商停止了对加密企业家 Justin Sun 创建的 Tron 区块链的支持
item.description: The operator of the $28 billion USDC stablecoin axed support for the Tron blockchain created by crypto entrepreneur Justin Sun trib.al/rVaR44z

item.title: 近 8000 名韩国实习医生没有报到上班，以抗议政府增加医学院学额的计划
item.description: Nearly 8,000 South Korean trainee doctors have not reported for work in a protest against a government plan to increase the number of seats at medical schools trib.al/2b7KZLp

item.title: 在冻结了一家大型基金的账户后，中国两大证券交易所誓言加强对量化交易的监管。
item.description: China’s two main stock exchanges vowed to tighten supervision of quant trading after freezing a major fund's accounts in an unusually harsh punishment trib.al/ZSVU8UZ

item.title: 慕尼黑安全会议暴露了欧盟与中国在欧盟最大的安全问题--乌克兰战争--上日益加深的分歧
item.description: The Munich Security Conference exposed the growing divisions between the EU and China over the bloc’s biggest security concern: the war in Ukraine trib.al/GxMiQgV

item.title: 最新文件显示，加密货币超级政治行动委员会 Fairshake 从亿万富翁双胞胎卡梅隆-温克艾沃斯（Cameron Winklevoss）和泰勒-温克艾沃斯（Tyler Winklevoss）那里筹集了 490 万美元。
item.description: Fairshake, the crypto super PAC, raised $4.9 million from billionaire twins Cameron Winklevoss and Tyler Winklevoss, its latest filings show trib.al/awyndZG

item.title:
乔-拜登希望通过排挤中国来打造本土电动汽车供应链，这一梦想可能会对特斯拉和整个美国汽车行业产生反作用。
阅读大事件 ⬇️
item.description:
Joe Biden's dream to create a homegrown EV supply chain by marginalizing China could backfire on Tesla, and the wider US car industry.

Read The Big Take ⬇️ trib.al/azLFZTV

item.title: Thoma Bravo 正在考虑出售消费者情报提供商 J.D. Power，包括债务在内的出售价格约为 80 亿美元。
item.description: Thoma Bravo is weighing a sale of consumer intelligence provider J.D. Power and looking for about $8 billion including debt trib.al/WAxjrnw

item.title: 第一量子公司的第二大股东将为铜运输支付 5 亿美元
item.description: First Quantum’s second-largest shareholder will pay $500 million for copper shipments trib.al/XcNwYz3

item.title: 日本 1 月份出口增长超过预期，为经济提供了亟需的支持
item.description: Japan’s exports grew more than expected in January, providing much-needed support for the economy trib.al/0ZyvJM8

item.title: 泰卜-马哈茂德（Taib Mahmud）是一位政治家和大亨，因其为追求经济发展而破坏马来西亚的热带雨林而闻名。
item.description: Taib Mahmud, the politician and tycoon who became known for enabling the destruction of Malaysia's rainforests in pursuit of economic development, has died at 87 trib.al/yhvrY45

item.title: 本月迄今为止，韩国出口在电子产品收益的推动下持续增长，支持了今年贸易可恢复强劲的观点
item.description: South Korean exports driven by gains in electronics have continued to grow so far this month, supporting the view that trade can regain strength this year trib.al/un5EfVZ

item.title: 杰夫-贝索斯抛售了 1400 万股亚马逊股票，价值约 24 亿美元，结束了他在短短九个交易日内抛售多达 5000 万股股票的计划
item.description: Jeff Bezos unloaded 14 million Amazon shares worth about $2.4 billion, wrapping up his plan to sell up to 50 million shares in just nine trading days trib.al/bXR4ORV

item.title: 泰国卫生部长表示，泰国希望在今年年底前禁止娱乐性使用大麻
item.description: Thailand wants to ban recreational use of cannabis by the end of this year, the nation’s health minister said trib.al/cM0d84j

item.title: 澳大利亚作家杨恒均宣布，他不会就中国法院二月初判处的死刑缓期执行提出上诉。
item.description: Australian writer Yang Hengjun has announced he won’t appeal a suspended death sentence imposed by a Chinese court in early February trib.al/aYCxBRu

item.title: 英国财政大臣杰里米-亨特（Jeremy Hunt）将在下个月的预算中为大选前的减税措施留出 230 亿英镑（291 亿美元）的余地。
item.description: UK Chancellor Jeremy Hunt will have £23 billion ($29.1 billion) of headroom for pre-election tax cuts in his budget next month trib.al/NLTbaLq

item.title: 巴拿马自 9 月以来首次利用国际债券市场，希望在 5 月总统选举出现波动之前筹集资金。
item.description: Panama is tapping international bond markets for the first time since September, looking to raise capital ahead of any volatility tied to a presidential election in May trib.al/WYX1qMG

item.title: 根据彭博社的一份报告，香港投资银行分析师的收入比新加坡同行高出 46
item.description: Investment-banking analysts in Hong Kong earn up to 46% more than their peers in Singapore, according to a report from Bloomberg Intelligence trib.al/7rRFB7H

item.title: 以下是有关石油市场的最新消息和分析
item.description: Here’s the latest news and analysis on the oil market trib.al/pajpvsJ

item.title: 美国国防部监察长称，五角大楼未能事先制定适当计划，指导乌克兰部队维护 M1 坦克等战车
item.description: The Pentagon failed to prepare adequate plans upfront to guide Ukraine forces in maintaining fighting vehicles, like M1 tanks, the inspector general for the Defense Department says trib.al/MQoIwbm

item.title:
RT by @markets：卡塔尔经济论坛将于2024年5月14日至16日在多哈举行，届时将召集各国元首和全球有影响力的商界领袖、学者和企业家就全球经济展开全面对话。#卡塔尔经济论坛#منتدى_قطر_الاقتصادي
在此注册
item.description:
Convening heads of states and influential global business leaders, academics and entrepreneurs for a comprehensive dialogue about the global economy, the @QatarEconForum returns to Doha May 14-16, 2024. #QatarEconomicForum #منتدى_قطر_الاقتصادي

Register here!
bloom.bg/42AKxv9

item.title: 亚马逊将取代道琼斯指数中的沃尔格林
item.description: Amazon will replace Walgreens in the Dow trib.al/YK8GFjm

item.title: #5Things：所有目光都聚焦在英伟达（Nvidia）的财报、美联储 1 月份会议纪要以及投资者对中国加大支持房地产行业的反应上。以下是市场动向。
item.description: #5Things: All eyes are on Nvidia’s earnings report, minutes of the Federal Reserve’s January meeting, and investor reaction to China’s ramped-up support for its property sector. Here’s what’s moving markets. trib.al/u0yIVd3

item.title: 了解全球市场的最新动态
item.description: Get up to speed on what's moving global markets trib.al/gCNG4hM

item.title: 巴西与以色列的外交裂痕升级，称本雅明-内塔尼亚胡总理的政府正在利用路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦总统关于加沙战争的争议性言论来 "掩盖 "正在那里发生的 "大屠杀"。
item.description: Brazil escalated a diplomatic rift with Israel, saying the government of Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu is using controversial remarks made by President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva about the war in Gaza to “hide a massacre” happening there. trib.al/HiYiK37

item.title: 需求不确定性导致铝价跌至四周低点
item.description: Aluminum Slumps to Four-Week Low on Demand Uncertainty trib.al/JWmzWOt

item.title: 由于普拉博沃-苏比安托（Prabowo Subianto）即将在总统竞选中获胜，消除了漫长选举过程中的不确定性，印尼央行很可能将保持基准利率的稳定
item.description: Indonesia’s central bank will likely keep its benchmark interest rate steady as Prabowo Subianto’s impending victory in the presidential race removes the uncertainty of a lengthy election process trib.al/RDsgbu6

item.title: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs）的瑞安-奥康纳（Ryan O'Connor）将加入总部位于纽约的交易所交易基金提供商 Global X ETF，担任首席执行官。
item.description: Goldman Sachs’ Ryan O’Connor is joining New York-based exchange-traded fund provider Global X ETFs as chief executive officer trib.al/4I6nUY6
